co.coinfinity.infineonandroidapp.utils

Class IsoTagWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.coinfinity.infineonandroidapp.utils.IsoTagWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NfcTranceiver

    public class IsoTagWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements NfcTranceiver
    Wraps IsoDep tag into NfcTranceiver interface. (this wrapper is used so that the co.coinfinity.infineonandroidapp.infineon package doesn't have any Android dependencies)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static IsoTagWrapper of(android.nfc.tech.IsoDep isoDep)
      Create wrapper of given IsoDep tag.
      byte[] transceive(byte[] commandApdu)
      Sends a command APDU to the NFC card and returns the received response APDU.
